name: @bbc/morty-docs
description: To generate a static website from markdown documentation, to allow users to consume content in an easily accessible format

scripts.start: rm -rf www && npm run build && node run.js && npx http-server www
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && babel src --out-dir build/src --source-maps && npm run build-copy-json && npm run build-npm-install
scripts.build-copy-json: cp package.json build/package.json && cp package-lock.json build/package-lock.json
scripts.make-package: npm run package-clean && babel src --out-dir package/dist && npm run package-add-root-files
scripts.package-add-root-files: cp package.json package/package.json && cp README.md package/README.md && cp LICENCE.md package/LICENCE.md
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push --tags origin master
